multiplan.title: Software Engineer
multiplan.item1: Implemented an end-to-end MVP for an automated parking lot system utilizing License Plate Recognition, leveraging Node.js and React.
multiplan.item2: Led frontend development for a high-traffic smart parking system (100k+ daily users, 2M+ plates).
multiplan.item3: Optimized performance by refactoring caching with React Apollo Client (70% fewer API requests, faster UX).
multiplan.item4: Integrated 4+ payment providers for seamless entry, exit, and payment.
multiplan.item5: Decreased critical errors by 20% and cut costs by increasing test coverage and implementing analytics (MixPanel, BugSnag).
multiplan.item6: Refactored EV Chargers communication from WebSockets to GraphQL Polling, resolving sync bugs and increasing user retention by 23%.
multiplan.item7: Architected a daily cron job for vehicle tier migration using Node.js and GraphQL, ensuring scalable, fault-tolerant execution.

pepsico.item3: Engineered a 10-minute periodic sync for truck monitoring, ensuring dashboard accuracy and optimized network overhead.
